data.name: Asteris-K
data.detailed_description:
A modern twist on a classic video game genre, Asteris-K is a top-down, twin stick shooter set in a cosmic horror inspired universe. Fight and dodge through tons of handcrafted levels, discovering fresh, challenging obstacles and unthinkable things along the way. Collect items from random events, earn coins to upgrade your ship, and build your strengths and weaknesses to your liking. Find your way home, but beware of the unknown... are you ever really safe?

Notable Features

  • Procedural graphics mixed with hand-drawn animation
  • Pleasing screen wrap (not disorienting!)
  • Emphasis on asteroid/debris/enemy variety
  • Warship-like steering (smooth gliding and steering via a "rudder" mechanic)
  • Turret-based aiming

data.short_description: Upgrade your ship, discover what lurks in the pits of space, and fight your way home in this top-down, story-driven space shooter! Fight and evade through five handcrafted chapters full of unique and bizarre obstacles -- sentient, inanimate, and everything in between. (pronounced a-ster-is-KAY)
